pkgmetadata.longdescription: Validate and Convert Mutational Impacts Using Standard Genomic Dictionaries // Check concordance of a vector of mutation impacts with standard dictionaries such as Sequence Ontology (SO) http://www.sequenceontology.org/, Mutation Annotation Format (MAF) https://docs.gdc.cancer.gov/Encyclopedia/pages/Mut ation_Annotation_Format_TCGAv2/ or Prediction and Annotation of Variant Effects (PAVE) https://github.com/hartwigmedical/hmftools/tree/master/pave. It enables conversion between SO/PAVE and MAF terms and selection of the most severe consequence where multiple ampersand () delimited impacts are given.
